passages.name: Start
passages.text:
You are on a beach

[[look around]] 
[[wade into the water]]

passages.name: look around
passages.text:
There is a coconut tree on the middle of the island

[[try to get a coconut]]

passages.name: wade into the water
passages.text: You are eaten by a shark. You died.

passages.name: try to get a coconut
passages.text: You fall off the tree and break your neck. You died.
